## SetCookieOptions.loose property

Controls if a cookie string should be parsed using `loose` mode or not. See [Cookie.parse()](./tough-cookie.cookie.parse.md) and [ParseCookieOptions](./tough-cookie.parsecookieoptions.md) for more details.

Defaults to `false` if not provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
loose?: boolean | undefined;
```
